features: Extended Size Desk Mat: This pink flower desk pad measures 31.5"×15.7"(80×40cm), which is large enough to accommodate your laptop, keyboard, mouse, coffee cup and more. Fits your desktop perfectly and provide perfect movement space. You can also cut to the size you want.

Protect Your Desk with Ease: Made of water-resistant and durable PU leather, which protects your desktop from scratches, stains, heat and spills.Easy to clean, just wipe with a wet cloth or tissue. The large desk mat is also a perfect organizer to keep your workspace clean and tidy.

Textured Surface: Textured surface allows more accurate mouse movement. Optimized for fast movement while maintaining excellent speed and control during your work or game. Eye-catching flower and plant print adds personality to your work or study space. An elegant office decor for women.

Non-slip Desk Cover: Non-slip base can firmly grip the desktop to provide stable operation of the mouse and keyboard. It can effectively prevent the mouse and keyboard from sliding and moving. Can be used as a desk mat, mouse pad, desk blotter, drawing & writing pad, and cute desk decor. Enjoy writing, typing and browsing on this computer desk mat!

What you will get: 1 x Colorful Star large desk mat. If an item is defective or teared within a year, we will issue a replacement. Further questions or concerns please feel free to contact us. Our dedicated service team is available to assist you anytime.

Comfortable resting surface for your hands while writing, typing, drawing and using the mouse. The surface reflects the moving light of mouse sensitively, make the accurate control. - Protect your desk. Keep your desk in order and cleanliness. - Excellent Desk Accessories. High precision printing technology allows for a variety of attractive and realistic colors, suitable for both women and girls, great desk decor! - This desk mouse pad is made of premium natural material. Non-toxic, no chemical coating, safe to use. - Perfect as women & teenage girl's desk mats. The creative learning space for you to work, make up, crafts, gaming, and more.

Great Desk Protector & Organizer 80×40cm (31.5×15.7 inch), this desk pad is large enough to accommodate your laptop, keyboard, mouse and other desk items. It provides plenty of room for home / office writting, drawing or gaming with extended arm movements. The mouse pad keep your desktop organized and clean!

Desk Pad Features Smooth Movement Textured surface allows more accurate mouse movement. Optimized for fast movement while maintaining excellent speed and control during your work or game. Great desk decor for office desk and kids desk. Waterproof & Easy to clean Water repellent surface effectively prevents damage from spilled drinks, stains, and scratches. Very easy to keep clean. When liquid splashes on the pad surface, just wipe it with a damp cloth. Suitable for writing This desk pad with comfortable and smooth surface can be used as a writing pad. It provides wrist support while typing, writing, drawing or using the mouse, and will not move once placed on a desk due to its non-slip backing.

Multifunctional Desk Pad Dressing Table Perfect Dressing Table mat, the beautiful floral pattern gives your room's makeup table a sweet and attractive look. Office Can be used as an office desk mat, It is a great office decor for woman's office. Drawing Perfect as Kid's desk mats. The creative learning space for your kid to do homework, arts, crafts, gaming, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adds Color to my Desk
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this desk mat for my desk at work. The quality and print are great and it brightens my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it, it’s the right size for my work area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love how it fits so well to my desk. Product came as described! Always a win win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Of low exceedingly quality
reviews.reviewText: The materials feel unpleasant to move a mouse around on, the edges feel sharp and uncomfortable. I’m having a hard time getting it to lay flat after unrolling it. It slips on my wooden desk as I use it. It doesn’t feel like synthetic leather, but like a ridged plastic material. The print is also rather blurry.I think I could probably recommend this as a mat to feed a baby over, as I’m sure it’s easy to clean.I sort of expected this, but I only tried it because the color scheme matched my key caps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite type of mousepad
reviews.reviewText: I have these on my work desk and desk at home. I absolutely love them. The colors and designs are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and beautiful desk pad
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because I have been at my current job for over six years and I was getting bored of how my office is decorated. This became the foundation piece for my new decor. This is really nice. It is thick and padded and well made. It comes rolled up, but it flattened out completely within a few days. One of my coworkers has a similar product and hers is paper thin and really just a cover. This is like the luxury version. The design is beautiful and it is very easy to clean. I eat at my desk most days so I clean it everyday and I have used cleaner on this everyday for a week without any fading of the design. I recommend, especially if you are thinking about ordering anything like this as there are other products that are not nearly as nice as this. I think that the price is very good considering the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but slides
reviews.reviewText: The mat itself is cute but keep in mind that it is plastic so it slides around a ton on my desk and doesn’t work well with a mouse. A little annoying so I am going to buy something different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for work, And i often need to clean my desk a lot & this being water proof is amazing! you can finally have something that's pretty & practical. The print is just as shown as advertised super clear & clean.Soft yet thick material feels like it will hold up for a long time unlike those fabric layered ones out there.
